name: Beginner Shot
description: A basic attack that anyone who picks up a bow could execute. Not to be used by anyone with decent experience with ranged weapons.

name: Straight Shot
description: A standard attack at center mass. Your basic low poise damage dealing move.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Quick Shot
description: A fast and balanced attack. Your basic poise generating damage dealing move.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Power Shot
description: A powerful attack. Your basic high poise damage dealing move.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Precision Shot
description: An accurate attack. An alternative to Straight Shot that buys some accuracy with some poise.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Wild Shot
description: A poorly aimed and heavy attack. An alternative to Straight Shot that buys some damage with poise and accuracy.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Careful Repose
description: You consider your next move. Your best poise generating move in the moveset.

name: Shadow Shot
description: An attack from darkness. An early option for dealing damage from behind cover.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Sniper Shot
description: A highly accurate shot. A strong high poise option with fantastic accuracy.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Wyvernfall
description: An attack that slays dragons. A powerful move to use at very high poise, with a chance to instantly kill the enemy.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

name: Take Aim
description: You aim carefully. A small buff that also generates a small amount of poise.
effects: * Your next attack has +1 to hit

name: Full Draw
description: You pull back fully on the bowstring. A small buff that also generates a small amount of poise.

name: Advancing Shot
description: You shoot while moving forward. A decent move to maneuver and attack at the same time.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Retreating Shot
description: You shoot while dashing backward. A good move to maneuver and deal damage at the same time.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Backflip Shot
description: You backflip and shoot at the same time. A strong maneuver with extra defenses and damage attached.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* You have +1 AC until the end of the round

name: Skyshot
description: An attack from high ground. A highly accurate attack if you manage to gain a height advantage.
additional_requirements: * You have a height advantage over your target
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage and instead has 1 level of advantage
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Leg Shot
description: An attack at the legs. A basic poise damaging move that isn't too expensive to execute.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Tactical Discussion
description: You discuss your next move with a teammate. A solid support option for fellow backline party members.
effects: * Target ally in the same line gains +10 poise

name: Covering Fire
description: An attack that covers an ally. A good way to help allies maneuver.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* Target ally may maneuver 1 line forward or backward

name: Big Game Hunting
description: An attack against the biggest threat. A powerful and reliable attack against high health targets.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* If the target has the highest current health amongst all characters in combat, this attack has +2d4 damage and has the following:
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Backup Shot
description: An attack to support an ally. A good way to protect allies while dealing damage.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* Target has -1 to hit on their next attack if their target is another ally

name: Twin Shot
description: You nock two arrows at once. An attack on two enemies at once as long as they are close to each other.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* This attack hits two enemies that are adjacent to each other

name: Rain of Arrows
description: You cause arrows to rain on your enemies. A powerful AOE attack if you're at high poise.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Weakening Shot
description: An attack aimed at major muscle systems. A decent option for controlling enemy damage output.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* Target has -1D damage on their next attack

name: Double Tap
description: A second attack on a wounded enemy. A good attack if you and your party are focusing on a single target.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* This attack has +2d4 damage if the target took 6 damage earlier this round

name: Blizzard Bow
description: An attack invoking the powers of snow. A rare option for a well aimed stunning attack.
additional_requirements: * You are in a snow biome
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Ruinhunter
description: An attack to flush out enemies hiding amongst ruins. A strong option when enemies are hiding behind rubble.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* This attack ignores cover provided by rubble

name: Flushout Shot
description: An attack against a well-positioned enemy. An excellent option if enemies are abusing special positions.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* This attack has +2d4 damage if the target is in a special position

name: Raiding Shot
description: An attack while on horseback. A very poise efficient option for mounted ranged weapon users.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* You maneuver 1 line forward or backward

name: Gore Stream
description: A series of fast attacks. An attack that scales with repeated use.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* This attack has +1d4 damage for every time it has been used in succession, up to a limit of +3d4

name: Opening Volley
description: A powerful initial attack. A move that can only be used once per combat, to start off the fight.
additional_requirements: * This is the first round of combat
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Hunter's Mark
description: An attack that exposes weaknesses. A great way to set up allies for a chance at improved damage.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* Until the end of the next round, the target grants attacks against it that have no critical strike chance the following:
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Knifebreaker
description: An attack leveraging the bow's range superiority over the dagger. A great counter to shortblade wielding enemies.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* This attack has +1 to hit and +2d4 damage if the target wields a shortblade

name: Arrow Drop
description: An attack aimed high at the sky. A higher damage alternative to Straight Shot that doesn't allow you to pick your target.
effects: * This attack selects a random enemy target
* This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Serrated Shot
description: An attack that tears at flesh. An option for dealing damage over time.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* Target takes 1d4 damage at the end of each round until the end of the next round

name: Pinning Shot
description: An attack that pins an enemy in place. A good way to control enemy movement if you can anticipate what the enemy will do.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* Target fails to maneuver this round

name: Broadhead Shot
description: An attack with a broadhead arrow. An effective option against an enemy's mount.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* If this attack is made against a mount, it has +2d4 damage and has the following:
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Dispelling Shot
description: An attack that confuddles mages. An excellent option to prevent the actions of enemy spellcasters.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* Target fails to cast spells this round

name: Pinpoint Shot
description: An attack with an armor piercing round. A good option against heavily armored enemies.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* This attack ignores AC granted by armor

name: Pointblank Shot
description: An attack from up close. An efficient damage dealing option if you're willing to put yourself at risk.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Piercing Shot
description: An attack that hits enemies in a straight line. An efficient AOE damage dealing move that exploits a ranged weapon's unique accuracy.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* This attack hits 1 target in each line

name: Knockback Shot
description: An attack with a heavy arrow. A way to shove back enemies in the frontline, or collapse a fragile midline.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage

name: Soulrending Shot
description: An attack that harms momentum heavily. A strong poise damage dealing move if your own poise is high.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage and target loses 5 poise

name: Stillness
description: You find your center. A long term accuracy buff if you can manage to avoid damage.
effects: * You have +1 to hit until the next time you take damage

name: Twisting Shot
description: An attack that does not miss. A reliable way to deal damage to enemies without armor.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* If this attack's Attack Roll is lower than 7, it becomes 7

name: Sorcerous Shot
description: An attack that focuses magical energy. A strong damage dealing move if an allied mage is assisting you.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* This attack has +2d4 damage if you are benefitting from a spell effect

name: Speed Shot
description: An attack that fires exceptionally fast. A way to deal damage out of poise order if you need to.
effects: * This attack ignores poise order and is instead executed at the beginning of the round

name: Delayed Shot
description: An attack that fires exceptionally slow. A way to deal damage out of poise order if you need to.
effects: * This attack ignores poise order and is instead executed at the end of the round

name: Countersniping
description: An attack against an enemy archer. A good way to counter ranged weapon wielding enemies that are harrying your team.
effects: * This attack has +2 to hit and +2d4 damage if your target wields a bow, is in the backline, and has dealt at least 5 damage this round

name: Genesis
description: An attack that creates new possibilities. A powerful attack that can only be used once per combat if you manage to get your poise high enough.
additional_requirements: * You have rested at least once since you last executed this move
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

* Your next attack that gains benefits based on additional requirements or certain conditions being fulfilled has those requirements and conditions automatically fulfilled. It also ignores its poise requirement.
